data.description:
Embark on an extraordinary journey with Fly, and redefine the way you explore our planet. Powered by Google's cutting-edge 3D Maps Tiles, this immersive experience lets you soar through the skies and witness the world's wonders like never before. From the ground all the way to the edge of space, you can truly Fly for the first time.

Global Exploration: Fly taps into Google's vast repository of 3D tiles, offering a true-to-life representation of Earth. Traverse majestic landscapes, iconic landmarks, and hidden gems from the comfort of your home. Whether it's the towering peaks of the Himalayas, the bustling streets of Tokyo, or triumphs of human engineering like the Eiffel Tower in Paris, the world is yours to discover.

Unique Motion in Flight: Feel the rush of wind as you take flight on your drone. Utilizing our unique motion controls enjoy a seamless and intuitive flying experience. Control your speed and direction with direct body motion and altitude with the joystick. Soar over mountains, glide through valleys, and experience the thrill of flight.

Streaming Music: With Feed.fm built in you will have a selection of music at your fingertips to enjoy. From Pop hits to EDM you can pick your own soundtrack.

Unleash your inner adventurer with Fly â€“ the ultimate virtual reality app that brings the world to your fingertips for the first time in a stand alone headset. Elevate your senses, broaden your horizons, and experience the magic of flight in a way you've never imagined.

changelog.change_log:
--1.0.2--
Crash bug fix related to number formatting conflicts across different languages

--1.0.3--
Addressed additional number formatting crashes

--1.0.4--
Clean up cache files to not unnecessarily use up disk space

--1.0.5--
Performance improvements allowing us to run at a higher resolution
Fixed another number formatting crash that had snuck back into the product

--1.0.6--
More performance tuning for a smoother experience
Re-enabled country and state boundary lines

--1.0.7--
Visual improvements to the UI
Fix for atmospheric flashing at jet altitude
More efficient Point of Interest requests to reduce network calls

--1.0.9--
New beta Search functionality added under the Pick a Destination menu
City borders are now drawn in yellow to indicate locations with Google 3D building and terrain data
Improved a problem with teleporting to high altitude cities and find yourself below the terrain

--1.0.10--
Pause screen now has an Options Menu (click on the gear icon)
Full joystick control options for Steering and Rotation added
You may now Hide the drone vehicle
Optionally change the balance between performance and resolution with a Level of Detail setting
